scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: In this one page autograph note, April 5, 1886, Richard Doddridge Blackmore, Teddington, Great Britain, writes to Mr. Heath, thanking him for his kind letter and another copy of the magazine [ Typus?] and for offering to show him most interesting things for which he has not the time at present.
